venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Celebrate this annual world-wide event with
Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist.

Visit for free hypnosis resources:
http://www.worldhypno...

Tonight, enjoy a relaxing group hypnosis session
and learn several very simple stress management
tips. Bring a pillow, mat and blanket, if desired.

Door prizes and free hypnosis gifts offered.
Bring your friends!

Seating is limited. Preregistration required.
Contact Kathryn McGlynn at the number
provided.

Donations accepted.

100% of proceeds donated to Our Weeping Angel
Foundation, a non-profit foundation that helps
people gain access to holistic healthcare.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: World Hypnotism Day - FREE Hypnosis Event
